paymentRequirementComplete.title: Dishwasher problem
paymentRequirementComplete.paymentPopupMsg: Since the Landlord account doesn't have sufficient balance to pay for the works, a payment request will be generated and the Landlord will be notified to make an online payment via the portal
paymentRequirementComplete.paymentPopupNote: NB:The landlord can also make an offline payment which can be processed manually via landlord accounts
paymentRequirementComplete.paymentPopupReason: Insufficient funds in Landlord's reserve,There are other invoices to be paid from next months rent,The Tenant has rent arrears,The rent has been paid upfront
paymentRequirementComplete.negativeResponseLNPLE: Proceed with Works Order without pre-payment
paymentRequirementComplete.proceedWithoutPaymentPopupMsg: Have you checked the LL account and are you sure you want to proceed without taking pre-payment?
paymentRequirementComplete.faultActionCWONACEQuestion: Contractor's response to the Works Order instruction?
paymentRequirementComplete.woAcceptConfirmMsg: Are you sure you want to accept the works order?
paymentRequirementComplete.faultActionCDTCEWOQuestion: Contractor's response for updating appointment Date/Time?
paymentRequirementComplete.positiveResponseCDTCEWO: Yes, agreed Date/ Time with Tenant
paymentRequirementComplete.pastDateError: The date/time you have chosen is in past, indicating the Contractor has already visited the property
paymentRequirementComplete.tenantSatisfyConfirmationMsg: Are you sure the Tenant is satisfied with the Job?
paymentRequirementComplete.invoiceApproveConfirmationMsg: This will send the Fault to Accounts team for payment. Are you sure?
paymentRequirementComplete.nextStepLARLEResponse: Fault Escalated - PM to decide the next steps

switchRepairToLLOwnRepair.title: Dishwasher problem
switchRepairToLLOwnRepair.differentWayOptions: Landlord does their own repairs,Proceed with Worksorder,Obtain Quote
switchRepairToLLOwnRepair.diffRepairConfirmationMsg1: You have selected Landlord does their own repairs. Are you sure?
switchRepairToLLOwnRepair.faultActionLRLEQuestion: Does the landlord want to proceed with their own repairs?
switchRepairToLLOwnRepair.positiveResponseLRLE: Yes, Landlord wants to do their own repairs
switchRepairToLLOwnRepair.llOwnRepairConfirmMsg1: This will change the status to "Work in Progress"
switchRepairToLLOwnRepair.noOwnRepairConfirmMsg1: The fault status will change to "Escalation"
switchRepairToLLOwnRepair.nextStepLRLEResponse: Fault Escalated - PM to decide the next steps
switchRepairToLLOwnRepair.pastDateError: The date/time you have chosen is in past, indicating your Contractor has already visited the property
switchRepairToLLOwnRepair.arrangeOtherContractorConfirmMsg: Are you sure to arrange a contractor?
switchRepairToLLOwnRepair.markJobCompleteTxt: Are you sure the repair is complete?

switchRepairToLLOwnRepair.negativeResponseLFTE: No, Not satisfied with the Job
switchRepairToLLOwnRepair.tenantSatisfyConfirmationMsg: This will close the Fault. Are you sure?
